name: Meetup: Find events nearby
description: Get connected with local groups hosting online events so you can meet new people and try new things. Use Meetup to build your career, find support, get out of your comfort zone, or pursue a passion. Download the app to discover online events hosted by local groups, or start a group to schedule your own online events.  Discover local online events and groups - Get matched with online events based on your interests, from book clubs to free yoga and more - Explore groups hosting online events by category, search by keyword, or see whats popular in your area - Save events youre interested in and revisit them later - Use discussions and messaging to stay in touch with the people you meet  Start a group - Host your own online events by creating a group for whatever youre into - Watch your community grow as your group is recommended to interested people - Easily personalize and schedule events on-the-fly, and manage your group from anywhere - Keep the momentum going between events by sharing photos and using discussions and messaging to connect with the people in your group  Get in touch with questions or suggestions: androiddev@meetup.com  In order to recommend Meetup events that are hosted by local groups, we use your devices precise location (GPS and network-based).
